description:
Find your way with this topographical map providing general-purpose, detailed coverage depicting ground relief, water bodies, forest cover, populated areas, and transportation routes. This 1:50,000 scale National Topographic System (NTS) map provides enough detail for a range of recreational activities.

  • Latitude, longitude and UTM coordinates included
  • Legend on the reverse side
name: NTS Map 82K10-Howser Creek
